name: Mt Pelerin
summary: Buy AVAX and USDC directly on your own Avalanche wallet in minutes, no KYC required. Cash them out from your wallet and withdraw funds in 20+ currencies on your bank account in 171 countries. Get the live market rates, the lowest fees and no hidden costs. Integrate our crypto-fiat gateway to your website or mobile app in a few clicks. Mt Pelerin is an authorized financial intermediary regulated and audited in Switzerland.
